price: Azap size gelmeden önce, Rabbinize yönelin ve O’na teslim olun ki sonra hiç bir yardım göremezsiniz.
arabic: وَأَنِيبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ وَأَسۡلِمُواْ لَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَكُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-anībū ilā rabbikum wa-aslimū lahu min qabli an yatiyakumu al-ʿadhābu thumma lā tunṣarūna
